title: Gooch, blanch and hazel script
content:
Hi,

I’m trying to find the fonts above to purchase online. Soed anyone know where I might find them, or be able to purchase them?

Thanks,

Clare

 [‹ Font ID: Red Interactive Site Headings](http://web.archive.org/web/20080421215110/http:/typophile.com/node/44254 "Go to previous forum topic") [Pls help me to find out the font from this image ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080421215110/http:/typophile.com/node/44209 "Go to next forum topic")
author: clare.holmes

comments.content: [Paul Hunt](http://web.archive.org/web/20080421215110/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Paul%252BHunt) has made [P22 Allyson](http://web.archive.org/web/20080421215110/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ihof/p22-allyson/) which ‘is based on an old metal font by Barnhart Bros. & Spindler named Hazel Script.’
